mapper.sql: teacher_id, teacher_no, user_id,name, gender, age, birthday, phone, address, admission_date, state, is_delete, create_time, update_time, op_user_id, op_user_name, op_role_name
mapper.select: select teacher.teacher_id, teacher.teacher_no,teacher.user_id, teacher.name, teacher.gender, teacher.age, teacher.birthday, teacher.phone, teacher.address, teacher.admission_date, teacher.state,teacher.is_delete, teacher.create_time, teacher.update_time, teacher.op_user_id, teacher.op_user_name, teacher.op_role_name, cla.class_id,cla.name as class_name from zm_teacher teacher left join zm_class_relation_teacher rela on teacher.teacher_id = rela.teacher_id left join zm_class cla on cla.class_id = rela.class_id where teacher.teacher_id = #{teacherId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: update zm_teacher set is_delete = 1 where teacher_id = #{teacherId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into zm_teacher (teacher_id, teacher_no,user_id, name, gender, age, birthday, phone, address, admission_date, state, is_delete, create_time, update_time, op_user_id, op_user_name, op_role_name) values (#{teacherId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teacherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admissionDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{opUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{opUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opRoleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update zm_teacher
teacher_no = #{teacherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
admission_date = #{admissionDate,jdbcType=DATE},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
op_user_id = #{opUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
op_user_name = #{opUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
op_role_name = #{opRoleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where teacher_id = #{teacherId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update zm_teacher set teacher_no = #{teacherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admission_date = #{admissionDate,jdbcType=DATE}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, op_user_id = #{opUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, op_user_name = #{opUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, op_role_name = #{opRoleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where teacher_id = #{teacherId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from zm_teacher
and is_delete = 0
and teacher_no like CONCAT('%',#{teacherNo},'%')
and name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and gender = #{gender}
and phone like CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%')
and state = #{state}
order by update_time desc

select
from zm_teacher where is_delete = 0 and state = 0
